admin.label: Administrator
dir_conditionGenerale2: To be in conformity with the French labour regulations, the business status is defined by the following conditions:
dir_objetStatut1: I. The purpose of the status
dir_objetStatut2: This status is used to attend meetings, conferences, fairs, congresses, customer appointments, observation visits, participation in theoretical training sessions in the classroom, and can not be used to exercise any occupation.
dir_objetStatut4: Workshop visits: 1 day per visit as an observer
dir_objetStatut5: Tests on tracks: 2 hours only for the following 2 reasons: discovery of vehicle or discovery of track.
dir_dureeVoyage1: II. The duration of the trip in business trip
dir_dureeVoyage2: A visit to France cannot last more than 15 calendar days on French territory.
dir_dureeVoyage3: As an exception, for journeys to attend a theoretical training session, the duration may be up to one month.
dir_dureeVoyage4: This implies that other people do the same training with a training program.
dir_freq2: The business trip status allows a maximum of 8 visits per year.
dir_freq3: Deadline for one month between visits.
description_lettre: The information will be used to generate the INVITATION LETTER in French and English.
description_pourquoi_acces: Why do you need access to the track?
activite-BT: DESCRIPTION OF THE BUSINESS TRIP : Please tick the boxes describing your mission
activite_meeting: Meetings (except to manage a team OR involved in decisional process)
activite_workshop: Workshops visits as « observer » for one day
duration_more_15: More than 15 calendar days in a row
duration_one_month_more: More than 1 month for theoretical training
duration_less_15: Less than 15 calendar days in a row
duration_month_between: 1 month between 2 visits month between 2 visits
